name: SPROUTS (Part 0: Intro)
description: Good time of day! We are glad to present you our second game. This time it is slightly larger than the previous one. It is also a music and art interactive gallery. But there is also an adventure and a quest. And a flower growing simulator. The game contains absolutely no violence. But sometimes it can get creepy. There are elements of horror, but without violence. Have a nice game! We hope that we are doing something useful for you.
